name: VigonVoice
0:
”Alexa, open Vigon Voice.”
”Alexa, ask Vigon Voice to request a sample.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vigon voice
Developer Terms of Use
des: Access Vigon's catalog of products with ease. With a few short steps, you can directly request many of Vigon's samples. Simply ask Alexa to request a sample and say the name of the product you want to sample. Once you provide your email address, one of our customer support will reach out to finalize the request.
